job.title: 100% REMOTE Machine Learning Engineer - Python, AWS
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: If you are a Machine Learning Engineer with Python & AWS experience, please read on! Machine Learning Engineer - Python, AWS Hollywood, CA - open to 100% REMOTE candidates $120K - $140K+ base Depending on Experience plus equity!  Our company develops AI based dental technology designed to identify pathological issues in real-time and with quality precision. Our company's technology recognizes and measures dental pathologies, restorative features and natural anatomy, enabling clinicians, practice owners, labs and insurers to elevate the efficiency, accuracy and consistency of dental healthcare.  Top Reasons to Work with Us What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position  B.S., M.S. or Ph.D. degree in computer science or a related field with 3+ years of experience with the following: So, if you are a Machine Learning Engineer with Python & AWS experience, please apply today! or send an updated copy of your resume to for immediate consideration! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Mike.Vandenbergh@Optello.com Mike Vandenbergh - Lead Recruiter - Optello  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.  Optello will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring (Ban the Box) Ordinance.
